channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1530612845909798912
item.description:
My talk on how we estimate parameters (masses, spins, distance etc.) of binaries we see in gravitational-wave detectors! This was given online at the 5th GW Open Data workshop.
https://t.co/4cjJzKt1Wp

item.title: #und @ 1530585961792421891
item.description: Na taj način, #GIS platforma https://t.co/sQcefNYfcy kroz tehnologiju i upotrebu #opendata pomaže razvoj #smartcity, odnosno gradova koji koriste nove tehnologije kako bi unapredili život u lokalnoj zajednici. Hvala #CIVINET mreži! Više na https://t.co/mNnotTsbgI

item.title: #pt @ 1530582425201410048
item.description: @daniloteo @ViniciusPoit Essa análise foi feita pelo próprio diretório nacional? Existe uma análise com o crescimento e queda de filiados com os dados abertos e de forma transparente para os contribuintes do NOVO? Ou você está o pdf enviesado que estava circulando em whatsapp ?

item.title: #fr @ 1530564018125037569
item.description: @MichelleBoitel1 @j_jvalen @JLMelenchon @mbompard Ces chiffres sont publics, conformément à la loi et rendus disponibles en open data sur le site du gouvernement destiné à l’open data.

item.title: #en @ 1530555817065422848
item.description: tired (but true): Public officials should publish expenses regularly as Open Data (briefly: not PDF, licensed for re-use). wired: Media should ask about Open Data, routinely. If this means updating “standards & practices” policy, fine: how do we push for this?

item.title: #ja @ 1530551658920390656
item.description:
【2022年5月27日 九州地方の火山性地震】
阿蘇山 59回 65⤵︎⚠️ 霧島山(えびの高原(硫黄山)周辺) 3回→ 霧島山(新燃岳) 8回10⤵︎ 桜島 2回→ 薩摩硫黄島 6回 3↗︎‼️ 口永良部島 1回 (5/25 1回) 諏訪之瀬島 31回 17⤴︎❗️ ※ 爆発地震 7回 1⬆️※
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ https://t.co/2ivBzqPTvu

item.title: #en @ 1530494833327996928
item.description: How can you have open data and open knowledge if common parlance terminology is entirely contradictory to the terminology used in the data and how do you collect *self-reported* data without shared definitions between participants and collectors/analysts? https://t.co/hKJdO9lHkE

item.title: #en @ 1530463756291014656
item.description: Just finished importing more than 1.6 million background radiation measurement points to the @SaveEcoBot from the sensors installed near Ukrainian nuclear power plants and in the #Chornobyl Exclusion Zone. Some measurements are from the 2014! Huge field for research. #OpenData https://t.co/KduKaGINml

item.title: #fr @ 1530307790371180544
item.description: Toutes ces tracasseries pour un tweet où j'analysais des données publiques, les sbires de Macron avaient inventé une infraction qui n'existe pas (les données personnelles ne sont pas des "choses" que l'on peut voler et s'approprier). Merci à @JeanTeissedre, mon avocat.

item.title: #en @ 1530259842409144322
item.description: @roraineto @Valtzen @sergioajv1 @Soar_Earth @inpe_mct @dsrinpe @laercionamikawa @annamaria_84 @sidneysgoveia @flasmendes @SotisValkan @BzGEO @DaveAtCOGS 🔵 Love to see the use of satellites that are not as known as Landsat or Sentinel. item.title: #en @ 1530254288546578435
item.description: You have downloaded the #opendata. But, how does #Landsat9 get from space to you and what happens along the way? Satellite info including mission architecture. 🛰️ See: Masek et al. #Landsat 9: Empowering open science and applications through continuity. 🔗https://t.co/aXmEJkXbKW https://t.co/V6oZ7Qkxmo

item.title: #en @ 1530247656735485953
item.description: “I called them orcs because I didn’t understand purpose of a special military operation. After I completed the full course of denazification,I realized that I was wrong”. Traces of gore can be seen in the corner of his mouth. Judging by open data, Viktor is a happy family man. /7

item.title: #en @ 1530204773445775365
item.description: Even when #data is disaggregated by gender, in-depth analysis isn't always done. #GenderData use is often hindered by weak survey methodology & limited data tabulation. @WorldBank works on strengthening gender data to #AccelerateEquality. —@diva_dhar https://t.co/g6VYbzcEpm

item.title: #it @ 1530126807357341696
item.description:
Le liste dei gay/anziani/grassi quando?
Esempio: se hai una bandierina arcobaleno nel profilo é un dato pubblico e il tuo nome finisce nel censimento di "chissà chi".
Poi, chissà, ti verranno a prendere, ti licenzieranno, ti interneranno. O altro.
TUTTO NORMALE?

item.title: #en @ 1530107414497972224
item.description: I'm impressed to see many presentations mention Open Data, Open Materials, and Preregistered Study Design. #OpenScience is making significant progress in communication research, especially among younger colleagues. Happy to follow the lead of an Open Science generation! #ica22

item.title: #en @ 1530085428149248002

item.description:

item.title: #en @ 1530064906950791169
item.description:
Wow, they did it. @JustFixNYC scrapped public open data to show the evolution of property ownership in NYC — & consequences.
The pattern of growing corporate ownership of buildings in NYC tracks w/higher eviction rates.
Amazing. Terrible. Predictable. https://t.co/e4oIpIBQ9J https://t.co/P7g8eGN7We

item.title: #en @ 1529836015308914689
item.description: So pleased to launch this book from @uOttawaPress with my great co-editor @pjrplan. The book is also available in #openaccess as a PDF. item.title: #en @ 1529745627990605825
item.description: Today at #LPS22? Come to Poster #147 at 17:00, to see #Rstats package "sits", an open source alternative to @GoogleEarthEng. Supports full cycle of land classification. Access open data in @DEarthAfrica @BrazilDataCube @Microsoft Planetary Computer, Earth on @AWS. (1/3)
